title: Gypsy: A Tainted Age
description: Delle is an outcast even among the exiled. She has been living on the fringes of society for years, struggling to conceal the one thing about herself that has ruined her life over and over again. It used to be her main priority. That was before they took Attis.Forced to maneuver between the world she knows and the deceptively beautiful world of the Provincials, it’s no surprise that adding one of them to her caravan doesn’t make the journey to find Attis any easier. The Provincial is hiding something.With the Provincial testing her sanity, Delle’s beliefs about her identity and those around her are quickly toppling. Has the time finally come to utilize her deepest secret in order to save her caravan - even if it means exposing her darkest potential?Without Attis, Delle’s life is a tangle of confusion, fear, and guilt about feelings that she isn’t sure she wants to admit.That’s why she’s going to bring him back. No matter what the cost.
author: Ash Leigh
